Background: Bookkeeper Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19519/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13

Features/Skills

Feats: Additional Lore (Astral Plane Lore); Additional Lore (Astrology Lore); Additional Lore (Mining Lore); Alchemical Discoveries; Assurance (Ratfolk Lore); Assurance (Tea Lore); Athletic Strategist; Blind-Fight; Bon Mot; Certain Stratagem; Clever Improviser; Clue Them All In; Connect The Dots; Courtly Graces; Defensive Stratagem; Detective's Readiness; Didactic Strike; Dubious Knowledge; Eliminate Red Herrings; Empiricist's Eye; Everyone's A Suspect; Experienced Professional; Exploit Blunder; Flexible Studies; Foresee Danger; Glean Contents; Implausible Purchase; Improvised Repair; Incredible Improvisation; Incredible Investiture; Just As Planned; Just One More Thing; Just The Facts; Known Weaknesses; Lead Investigator; Legendary Professional; Lie Detector; Make 'Em Sweat; Multitalented; Natural Ambition; Ongoing Investigation; Ongoing Strategy; Person Of Interest; Plot The Future; Predictive Purchase; Quick Jump; Read Lips; Reason Rapidly; Reconstruct The Scene; Risky Surgery; Scalpel's Point; Sense The Unseen; Share Tincture; Shared Stratagem; Skill Training (Astral Plane Lore); Skill Training (Catfolk Lore); Skill Training (Scribing Lore); Solid Lead; Strategic Assessment; Strategic Bypass; Streetwise; Surgical Shock; Suspect Of Opportunity; Takedown Expert; Terrain Stalker (Underbrush); That's Odd; Thorough Research; Trap Finder; Trickster's Ace; Unconventional Weaponry (Greatsword); Underworld Investigator; Unmistakable Lore; Unusual Treatment; Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons); Whodunnit? Investigator Features: Alchemical Sciences; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attribute Boost (Intelligence); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Investigator); Clue In; Deductive Improvisation; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Devise A Stratagem; Dogged Will; Empiricism; Forensic Medicine; Fortitude Expertise; General Feats; Greater Dogged Will; Greater Weapon Specialization; Incredible Senses; Interrogation; Investigator Expertise; Investigator Feats; Investigator Skills; Keen Recollection; Light Armor Expertise; Light Armor Mastery; Master Detective; Methodology; On The Case; Perception Expert; Save Expert (Reflex; Will); Save Trained (Fortitude); Savvy Reflexes; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Skillful Lessons; Strategic Strike; Vigilant Senses; Weapon Expertise; Weapon Mastery; Weapon Specialization Bookkeeper Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Eye For Numbers; Skill Trained (Society; Accounting Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Skilled Human

Empiricism: Has the That's Odd and Expeditious Inspection features
Forensic Medicine: Has the Forensic Acumen and Battle Medicine features

Human Heritage: 1 selection
Interrogation: Has the No Cause For Alarm and Pointed Question features
Investigator Expertise: Has increased Pursue A Lead effects
Investigator Feats: 11 selections
Methodology: 1 selection
Natural Ambition: +1 Class Feat
On The Case: Has the Clue In and Pursue A Lead features
Predictive Purchase: Has the Prescient Planner and Prescient Consumable features
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Skillful Lessons: +9 Skill Feat
Implausible Purchase: Can use Prescient Planner at will with 1 action, and can use it to retrieve a level 14 consumable 5 times per day
Predictive Purchase: Can use Prescient Planner with 2 actions
Prescient Consumable: Can retrieve an undeclared consumable from backpack once per shopping trip
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Perception: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Skill Modifiers:
Accounting Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Diplomacy: +26 (charisma; trained) Outer Rifts Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Astral Plane Lore): Skill Legendary (Astral Plane Lore)
Additional Lore (Astrology Lore): Skill Legendary (Astrology Lore)
Additional Lore (Mining Lore): Skill Legendary (Mining Lore)
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Alchemical Discoveries: Has increased Alchemical Sciences and Versatile Vials effects
Alchemical Sciences: Skill Trained (Crafting)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Empiricism: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any Intelligence)
Forensic Medicine: Skill Trained (Medicine)
Incredible Senses: Perception Legendary
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Interrogation: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Investigator Skills: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 19 from any)
Skill Training (Astral Plane Lore): Skill Trained (Astral Plane Lore)
Skill Training (Catfolk Lore): Skill Trained (Catfolk Lore)
Skill Training (Scribing Lore): Skill Trained (Scribing Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Underworld Investigator: Skill Trained (Underworld Lore)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Alchemical Sciences: Knows the formulas for 41 common alchemical elixirs or tools
Assurance (Ratfolk Lore): Can take an automatic 34 on Ratfolk Lore checks
Assurance (Tea Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Tea Lore checks
Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Clue In: (R) Gives another creature +1 on a Perception or skill check that will help to answer the active investigation question once per 10 min
Clue Them All In: Clue In applies to all allies for 1 rd
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Deductive Improvisation: Can attempt skill checks that require trained, expert, or master proficiency when untrained, trained, or expert
Devise A Stratagem: (1) Prevents Striking a chosen creature, but gives +1 on the next intelligence-, wisdom-, or charisma-based Perception check involving it, before the start of the next turn once per rd
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Eliminate Red Herrings: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge about an active investigation are normal failures
Everyone's A Suspect: 1 min interaction gives an automatic Pursue A Lead; may have an unlimited number of these
Expeditious Inspection: (F) Uses Recall Knowledge, Seek, or Sense Motive once per 10 min
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Flexible Studies: Can become trained in 1 skill during daily prep
Forensic Medicine: Battle Medicine restores +20 Hit Points and can be used on the same target once per hr
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Interrogation: Can Pursue A Lead and Make An Impression simultaneously
Just One More Thing: Rerolls a normal failure on a Demoralize, Feint, Request, Lie, Gather Information, Make An Impression, or Coerce check, adding 1 if the check is connected to an ative investigation, once per target per day; rerolling Demoralize, Feint, and Request requires 1 action; the others require the maximum of 1 rd or half the time spent on the failed action
Just The Facts: Can make an additional Recall Knowledge each round, knows the result of Recall Knowledge checks, gains +1 level of success on Recall Knowledge checks, and recognizes inaccurate knowledge from self or ally Recall Knowledge checks
Keen Recollection: +20 on untrained Recall Knowledge checks
Lead Investigator: 1 min briefing gives 4 allies Pursue A Lead bonuses to investigation checks for 1 day
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Lie Detector: +1 Pecreption to Sense Motive and DCs vs. attempts to Lie, or +2 when Pursuing A Lead; success gives +1 to the next Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance vs. the target within 1 min
Make'Em Sweat: Successful Pointed Question inflicts frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical success
Master Detective: Automatically senses the presence of a clue that pertains to an active investigation when entering a new location
No Cause For Alarm: Successful Diplomacy reduces frightened levels by 1 in a 10' emanation, or by 2 on a critical success
Ongoing Investigation: Can Investigate at full Speed and use another exploration activity while Investigating
Person Of Interest: (1) Can Devise A Strategem against a chosen creature unrelated to active investigations for 1 min once per 10 min
Plot The Future: 10 min reflection gives a general idea of the liklihood of an event up to 1 week in the future and a suggestion of how to change the liklihood
Pointed Question: (1) Successful Diplomacy vs. Will gives +2 Perception to detect a Lie and inflicts off-guard vs. a Devise A Stratagem Strike until the end of the turn; critical success gives +4 Perception; critical failure worsens the target's attitude by 1 step
Pursue A Lead: Can use 1 min examining a detail to detect a deeper mystery; success opening an investigation and gives +1 on later Perception and skill checks when attempting to answer a central question about it
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Quick Tincture: (1) Uses a versatile vial to create a alchemical elixir or tool of up to level 20 that lasts until the end of the turn
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and off-guard
Reason Rapidly: (1) Uses up to 5 Recall Knowledge actions
Reconstruct The Scene: 1 min survey gives impressions of events that occurred within the prior day
Sense The Unseen: (R) Makes undetected foes hidden after a failed Seek
Share Tincture: (1) Uses Quick Tincture to create an item lasting until the start of the next turn and can pass it to another creature
Solid Lead: Can use 1 action to later switch back to following a chosen lead
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Terrain Stalker (Underbrush): Sneaking 5' in underbrush at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
That's Odd: Automatically notices one unusual detail when first entering a location and can immediately use Pursue A Lead with it
Thorough Research: Success on a Recall Knowledge check gives additional information
Trap Finder: Gives +1 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require master proficiency in Thievery
Underworld Investigator: +1 Thievery to investigate a case
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Unusual Treatment: Successful DC 20 check to Treat Wounds reduces a choice of clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied by 1 once per patient per day
Versatile Vials: Can create 4 versatile vials during daily prep
Whodunnit?: Successful Pursue A Lead allows receiving answers to 2 questions about the mystery once per day
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Investigator: 40 (intelligence; master)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Fist (+30 1d4+3 B; dexterity; master); Hatchet (+29 1d6+3 S R10'; strength; master); Longspear (+29 1d8+3 P; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Investigator Expertise: Class Expert (Investigator)
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Detective: Class Master (Investigator)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Greatsword): Weapon Familiarity (Greatsword)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Expert (Martial Weapons)
Athletic Strategist: Can use Devise A Strategem with Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip, and can use Intelligence for the check
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Certain Stratagem: Failed Devise A Strategem Strike that uses Intelligence inflicts %5d6 / 2 HP
Connect The Dots: (2) Successful Perception vs. a foe's Deception or Will gives a chosen ally +1 on its next attack on the target before the start of the next turn; critical success gives the ally +1 on all attacks before for the start of the next turn; critical failure inflicts stupefied 1 on self until the end of the next turn
Devise A Stratagem: (1) First Strike vs. a chosen creature before the start of the next turn uses a pre-rolled value for the attack once per rd; it can substitute intelligence for strength or dexterity if using a sap or an agile, finesse, or non-thrown ranged weapon
Didactic Strike: Can use Shared Strategem with 10 allies; their Strikes on the target inflict +2d6 HP precision
Empiricist's Eye: Can use non-auditory Point Out, the target is off-guard to allies until the start of the next turn, and allies can use Blind-Fight effects against it
Exploit Blunder: (R) Takes a Step after the triggering miss by a Devise A Strategem target from the prior turn
Foresee Danger: (R) Triggering foe attack targets Perception DC instead of Armor Class
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gives +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Just As Planned: (F) Devise A Strategem uses the higher of 2 d20 rolls once per hr
Known Weaknesses: Critical success on a Recall Knowledge as part of Devise A Strategem gives allies and self +1 on first attack on target before the start of the next turn
Ongoing Strategy: Non-Devise A Strategy Strike using a qualifying weapon inflcits +{(level+3)//4} HP precision
Scalpel's Point: Critical hits on Strategem attacks with piercing or slashing damage inflict +1d6 HP persistent bleed
Shared Stratagem: Successful Devise A Stratagem Strike makes the target off-guard to the next attack by a chosen ally before the start of the next turn
Strategic Assessment: First successful Stratagem attack gives info on the target's weaknesses, resistances, saves, or immunties
Strategic Bypass: Successful Strategem Strike ignores resistance 4
Strategic Strike: Successful Devising A Stratagem Strikes inflict +5d6 HP precision
Surgical Shock: (1) Successful Medicine vs. Fortitude inflects a choice of clumsy 2 or stupefied 2; critical success inflicts clumsy 3 or stupefied 3; failure gives self +1 to the first self attack on the target before the end of the turn; critical failure triggers manipulate reactions
Suspect Of Opportunity: (R) Uses Person Of Interest against an attacking creature unrelated to any active investigation
Takedown Expert: Clubs gain Devise A Strategem attack bonus/Suffers no penalty for making a Strike nonlethal
Trap Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Dogged Will: Save Master (Will)
Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Greater Dogged Will: Save Legendary (Will)
Savvy Reflexes: Save Master (Reflex)
Defensive Stratagem: Can use Devise A Stratagem to gain +1 vs. all effects caused by a chosen creature, but preventing Striking it, before the start of the next turn
Detective's Readiness: +2 saves vs. creatures and effets related to an open investigation, and Clue In gives this bonus to allies
Dogged Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Greater Dogged Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes, critical Will failures are normal failures, and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Savvy Reflexes: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Trap Finder: +1 vs. traps
Magic
Magic Notes:
Incredible Investiture: Can invest 12 magic items
Trickster's Ace: (R) Previously-specified trigger invokes a prepared spell of up to level 4 on self
Notes
Validation Errors:
